author: jochembrouwer
content: Are the versions pointed in the devnet-5 spec of the EIPs https://notes.ethereum.org/@ethpandaops/pectra-devnet-5 correct? EIP-7691 or instance points to a version which looks super WIP (has no constants when compared to the master version for instance)

content: ah the commit might be stale by now, please go by the EELS and CL spec release for now? those should be at the latest state of the EIP
